So I would like to say it was my hard work and research that discovered the missing link, but in fact it was just a stroke of good luck."In 1998 the Nobel Prize was given to scientists for the discovery that nitric oxide, an element that can be naturally produced by the natural ingredients L-Arginine and L-Citrulline, where responsible for a variety of life changing benefits like boosting heart health by reducing arterial stiffness, reducing blood pressure and improving blood flow in your arteries. But no nitric oxide means no erection.While it was easy to get nitric oxide to all parts of your body except your brain and your penis because the capillaries in these too regions are so tiny and hard to penetrate as you age. It wasn't until French scientists, searching for an way to get nitric oxide to the brain to help prevent or slow down Alzheimer's that this "accidental" erection-boosting was discovered. The men in the study refused to give back the pills once the study was over. In fact, all the men in the study, even men as young as 43 asked for MORE of the pills because of how powerful it made their erections.The Day Everything Changed
